subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: A former N.B.A. player, now a league executive, asserts that two years of pre-N.B.A. experience would be better for the players and better for basketball, pro and college.
snippet: A former N.B.A. player, now a league executive, asserts that two years of pre-N.B.A. experience would be better for the players and better for basketball, pro and college.
